equipped.name: (a circlet of green leaves and trailing ivy)

mobs.long_desc: A well-armored human guard stands here.
mobs.desc: This sturdy human male is taller than average, with broad shoulders and a perpetual laconic look as he surveys the people walking past. He has on an assortment of the best armors available, and his sword is finely polished and sharpened.

mobs.long_desc: A red-surcoated guard stands near the northern archway.
mobs.desc: Little can be seen of him under his extensive armor, but he stands at rigid attention right near the northern archway of this tower. He doesn't seem at all inclined to chat.

mobs.long_desc: A blue-surcoated guard stands near the southern archway.
mobs.desc: Little can be seen of him under his extensive armor. He stands at attention near the southern archway of the tower, and seems disinclined to spend time in idle conversation.

mobs.long_desc: A haughty elven guard patrols the streets.
mobs.desc: She is tall and muscular, with braided red hair and amber eyes. She has a haughty expression on her finely-sculpted features, and she doesn't appear to miss much.

mobs.long_desc: A half-elven mage surveys the crowd critically.
mobs.desc: He is handsome, with pale skin, black hair, and dark eyes that seem at once arrogant and critical, wise and knowing. He is taller than the average human male, and of a far more wiry and slender build, but for the most part, he looks human.

mobs.long_desc: A dark-striped tabby cat noses around for food here.
mobs.desc: She's a sturdy little cat, with black stripes on a brown background. Her coat is fairly coarse, indicating that she lives outside all the time, and a bit is torn out of one of her ears.

mobs.long_desc: A gold-surcoated guard stands near the ascending staircase.
mobs.desc: He's young and very strong-looking, most likely human. He has broad shoulders and powerfully muscled arms and legs, and his deep green eyes do not miss much going on around him.

mobs.long_desc: A little burro stands off to the side.
mobs.desc: This burro is a sturdy little girl.  She is covered with dark brown fur that's black on the tips of her long ears.  A strap mark across her belly suggests that she has been used for hauling, but she looks healthy enough.

mobs.long_desc: A long-eared mule stands here munching on nothing.
mobs.desc: Covered with light brown fur, this hardy mix of horse and donkey looks intelligent and strong.  Its large dark eyes look at you carefully, as if analyzing your intentions.

mobs.long_desc: An odd-looking, tall beast of burden glares at you with yellow eyes.
mobs.desc: Is it a camel, horse, or dog?  Whichever, it is a tall lanky-legged beast with a very wide mouth, and covered with dirty-yellow fur.  Its feet are broad and flat, but it has a long furry tail that wags from time to time.  Its broad back looks like a good place for cargo or riders.

mobs.long_desc: A burly dirty guard hangs out near the south exit.
mobs.desc: This looks to be a man of about average height.  His greasy hair hangs down his back in a ponytail, and a ragged black shirt is tightly stretched over bulging muscles.  He has little reddish eyes that peer about, alighting on nothing. He smells a bit.

mobs.long_desc: A woman in a blue robe smiles in your direction.
mobs.desc: Aylana appears happy, relaxed, and at ease in her sumptuous home.  She has shiny golden hair which is pulled into a small vertical bun at the back of her head.  Her age is difficult to discern, but is probably over thirty years. She is of medium height and rather thin.  Despite the unpleasant appearance of the room outside, her bearing is one of welcome.

mobs.long_desc: A green-clad man guards the staircase.
mobs.desc: He is tall and wiry, with a lean build and tanned skin. He moves almost completely silently, but rarely moves far from his staircase. Sometimes he looks up to the top of the staircase, as if expecting somebody.

mobs.long_desc: A white-clad knight stands at attention.
mobs.desc: He is tall and lordly in his mail armor and his gleaming white surcoat. Standing at strict attention unless in battle, he doesn't talk to anybody or let himself get distracted.

mobs.keywords: priestess priest guildmaster master high-priestess guild-master
mobs.long_desc: A white-robed High Priestess worships here.
mobs.desc: She is of average height, and perhaps a bit overweight. Her features are fairly plain, but her devotion to her deity makes her appear radiant. She speaks gently, and her demeanor is humble.

mobs.long_desc: A black-surcoated guard stands near the descending staircase.
mobs.desc: Little can be seen of his features under his extensive armor. He stands at rigid attention near the staircase, keeping the nosy out.

mobs.keywords: pyromancer guildmaster woman red flame Archmage
mobs.long_desc: A flame-haired woman dressed in red stands before the fireplace.
mobs.desc: She is dangerous-looking indeed, with flame-colored red hair and bright green, almost feline eyes. She moves with sinuous grace, and when she speaks, her voice almost always has a purr in it -- unless she is angry. She seems like the sort who'd get angry often.

mobs.keywords: cryomancer scholar tall man Archmage guildmaster
mobs.long_desc: A tall scholar consults his books.
mobs.desc: He is a tall, pale human man, his skin having an almost bluish cast to it. He seems coldly rational, with his pale blond goatee and his neatly combed short hair, and the pale grey eyes he turns to visitors do not hold any warmth.

mobs.long_desc: A serene druidess tends to her plants.
mobs.desc: She is of average height and weight, with tattoos along her cheekbones, and an utterly serene expression. She walks with a slow, steady gait, stopping to check plants and trees.

mobs.keywords: necromancer pale white man gaunt guildmaster
mobs.long_desc: A pale, gaunt man examines a book.
mobs.desc: He looks supremely unconcerned with anything going on around him. Pale and gaunt, his white skin is evidence that he rarely sees the light of day, but his eyes burn with a feverish light. His hands are long-fingered to the point of being spidery, and slender to the point of being skeletal.

mobs.keywords: serena elf elven beautiful golden woman shopkeeper
mobs.long_desc: A beautiful, golden-haired elven woman tends to customers.
mobs.desc: Tall and elegant of bearing, this regal elf woman appears to be in her prime. Golden hair falls past her shoulders in a silken wave, and violet eyes dominate her face. High cheekbones and an aquiline nose give her even more of an aristocratic appearance.

mobs.long_desc: A hunchbacked mage cackles weirdly near the counter.
mobs.desc: He's very short, with long, oily grey hair that's more or less bound back by a cord. Hunchbacked, he hobbles around with a cane, and his thin, reedy voice is perfectly suited to wheezing and cackling, both of which he does constantly. His pointed noise and his pointed chin almost meet, but despite all this, he seems exceptionally intelligent.

mobs.long_desc: A barmaid makes rounds of the tables.
mobs.desc: She is wide-hipped, blonde, and extremely competent-looking. With professional savoir-faire, she nimbly steps past tables with her loaded tray, and just as easily sidesteps propositions from the good-natured patrons of the tavern.

mobs.long_desc: A girl sits behind the desk.
mobs.desc: She looks barely out of her teens, and has a freshly-scrubbed look to her. She may be an elf or half-elf, from her willowy build and general attractiveness, but it's difficult to say, since her hair goes past her ears and she doesn't have the disctinctive elven accent.

mobs.long_desc: A hardworking stable keeper scrubs the counter here.
mobs.desc: Shula is sleek and well defined, having grown up working long hour days.  Her arms are strong from having scrubbed the counter so often to keep it clean. Her hair is pulled back in a nice bow, making her beauty really stand out nicely.

mobs.long_desc: A dwarf tends to patrons of the bank.
mobs.desc: He is short and stout, like most dwarves, and fairly old, with a bushy white beard and spectacles on the end of his nose. He has a querulous voice that isn't ever very loud.

mobs.long_desc: The Archmage studies a book.
mobs.desc: Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the vast amount of knowledge she posesses. She is wearing fine magic clothing, and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

mobs.long_desc: Phayla, Daughter of the Sun, works in her sanctuary.
mobs.desc: Standing before you is a radiant woman with sunlight hair and luminous bronze skin.  She moves with a purposeful grace befitting her regal composure. Phayla wears a trailing robe made of a dark fabric which perfectly complements her complexion and noble bearing.  Yet behind her beauty is a stern, dispassionate demeanor which coolly and intently surveys her dimensional sanctuary.

mobs.long_desc: Belissica, grand diva of South Caelia, performs for her guests.
mobs.desc: Belissica is the foremost leading lady of the stage in all of known Ethilien. She regularly travels giving performances for lords and ladies the world over. Her home venue is in the port city of Solta, the sprawling port city of South Caelia.  She regularly brings the resplendent finery of her home city with her to gift her fellow bards in exchange for rewards for their adventures.

mobs.long_desc: The Soltan Gem Master watches over the lively Exchange.
mobs.desc: The gem trader is a jeweled and bedecked elder gentleman of considerable means and class.  His clothes are of the highest quality, crafted from sumptuous fabrics and colored with the rarest dyes.  Each accessory he wears is the purest metal, featuring flawless sparkling gemstones.  His keen eyes scrutinize every transaction in the Exchange with exacting precision and accounting.

objects.ground: A &6blue&0 silk down lies here.

extras.text: It is a beautifully cut dress, with a sweetheart neckline and puff-shoulder sleeves that flare past the wrists.  The v-shaped waistline flows down to a skirt that, instead of being gathered at the waist, is gored near the bottom for fullness by the addition of triangular panels to the seams.

objects.ground: Some black tights lie folded here.

extras.text: Sewn of black heavyweight silk, these well-tailored tights conform to the body beautifully.  They cover the lower body from waist to the toes, and tie at the waist.

objects.ground: A &1red&0 silk shirt lies neatly folded here.

extras.text: This expertly sewn shirt is crafted of mediumweight silk with a graceful drape. Dyed medium-red, it has a lace-up neckline and very full-cut sleeves caught at the wrists by cuffs.  The lower hem reaches past the thighs.  It makes soft whispering sounds when its wearer moves.

objects.ground: A pair of slippers dyed deep blue-black lie here.

extras.text: Crafted of heavyweight silk, these dainty slippers cover most of the foot. The soles are made of black leather and are suitable for use outside the city, and the shoes are padded slightly inside for comfort.

objects.ground: A &7&bfurry white&0 hooded mantle lies here, discarded.

extras.text: This furry white mantle is made from rabbit skins and lined in blue linen. Its hood is deep and roomy, and the ends of the hood cover the shoulders.

objects.ground: A runed scroll lies here, rolled up.

extras.text: It is written with many languages and scripts, but each one tugs at the reader with almost insistent familiarity....

objects.ground: A black stone slab rests in the center of the chamber.

extras.text: It is a large enough piece of stone that even a tall human could lie upon its cold surface with ease. There are no visible stains or markings upon the stone, which rests upon four short stone "feet". The slab is extremely heavy, and appears to be bolted to the floor so it can't be moved.

objects.ground: A blue linen dress lies on the ground.

extras.text: This modest dress is sewn from regular linen, and dyed a light medium- blue. It has three-quarter sleeves and a calf-length hem, with a circular keyhole collar.

objects.ground: A blue silk hair-ribbon flutters over the ground.

extras.text: It is a simple blue hair ribbon.

objects.ground: A small shot glass lies here.

extras.text: This small shot glass doesn't hold much, but the craftsmanship in it is obvious.

objects.short: a slice of elderflower cheese pie
objects.ground: A slice of cheese-pie rests here.

extras.text: Creamy and milk-colored, this slice of pie has a cookie-crumb crust. The pie tastes deliciously smooth and cool, with a hint of flowers and cheesecake.

objects.ground: Some steaming herbed potatoes lie here, waiting to be eaten.

extras.text: Potatoes that have been gently steamed, covered in butter, and sprinkled with herbs lie in this plate.

objects.short: a circlet of green leaves and trailing ivy
objects.ground: A circlet of leaves lies here, tossed aside.

extras.text: These vines of ivy are entwined with complimentary leaves and woven into a loose circle to make a beautiful garland.  It just fits on the crown of the head.  The long trailing ivy, holy in many Druidic traditions, creates a regal, statuesque silhouette.

objects.ground: A glowing sign hangs from the wall.

extras.text: The sign reads: To prevent confusion in our pupils, we've added separate offices for each of our professional tutors. Pyromancers -- NORTH Cryomancers -- SOUTH Necromancers -- DOWN Sorcerers -- UP Please don't irritate the Archmage by bothering tutors who cannot help you. Thanks.... the Management

objects.ground: A small book lies here.
A glowing black crystal hovers in the air here.

objects.short: the first clue to Phayla's whereabouts
objects.ground: A folded piece of paper flutters in the breeze.

extras.text: Nothing.

objects.ground: An enormous circular ring of polished white stone has erupted from the ground!

extras.text: This gateway is a perfect circle carved from interlocking blocks of smooth rounded white marble.  The front of each block is chiseled flat and a single large rune has been carved into the block's face.  At the very top of the gateway is a keystone block bearing a deep depression in the form of a radiating sun.

objects.ground: An enormous circular ring of polished white stone stands affixed to the southern wall.

extras.text: This gateway is a perfect circle carved from interlocking blocks of smooth rounded white marble.  The front of each block is chiseled flat and a single large rune has been carved into the block's face.  At the very top of the gateway is a keystone block bearing a deep depression in the form of a radiating sun.

objects.short: the second clue to Phayla's whereabouts
objects.ground: A folded piece of paper flutters in the breeze.

extras.text: Nothing.

objects.short: the third clue to Phayla's whereabouts
objects.ground: A folded piece of paper flutters in the breeze.

extras.text: Nothing.

triggers.argument_list: shift shift? corpse corpse? degeneration degeneration?
triggers.commands: wait 2 switch %speech% case shift case shift? case corpse case corpse? case shift corpse case shift corpse? if %self.class% /= Necromancer if %actor.class% /= Necromancer && %actor.quest_stage[shift_corpse]% == 0 say So you want to learn our most powerful secrets, eh? peer %actor% wait 1s if %actor.level% < 97 mecho %self.name% says, 'Unfortunately you are not prepared to handle such magic. mecho &0There are easier ways to kill yourself.' else nod mecho %self.name% says, 'I will teach you the words to the spell.  But the words mecho &0alone are meaningless.  The true power to fuel Shift Corpse cannot be mecho &0taught - it must be taken.' wait 2s say You must steal the power of a god. quest start shift_corpse %actor.name% endif else mechoaround %actor% %self.name% sneers at %actor.name%. msend %actor% %self.name% sneers at you. say This magic is not for you! endif else say That spell is far outside the realm of our Guild. endif break case degeneration case degeneration? if %self.class% /= Necromancer mecho %self.name% says, 'Controlling negative energy to bolster the dead or mecho &0degenerate the living is theoretically possible.  Someone is working to mecho &0develop a &9&bDegeneration&0 spell for use in the ongoing battle against mecho &0the Eldorian Guard.' else mecho %self.name% says, 'Only a powerful member of the Necromancer Guild mecho &0might know how to cast such a spell.' endif break done

triggers.name: shift_corpse_guildmaster_speech2
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[shift_corpse]% == 1 wait 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'Not just any god will do, either.  It cannot be one who is mecho &0imprisoned in mortal flesh, like Kannon in Odaishyozen, no.' shake mecho %self.name% says, 'It must be one unrestrained, at their full potential. mecho &0Fortunately there is a deity who has lost the support of the greater pantheon mecho &0leaving him vulnerable.' wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Lokari, God of the Moonless Night, in his outer planar mecho &0fortress is already wanted by the other gods for interfering in the world of mecho &0mortal men.' wait 3s emote opens a pitch black box. wait 4 emote takes a glowing black crystal from the box. wait 1s say Take this. mload obj 6228 give glowing-black-crystal %actor% wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'Give it to Lokari and then banish him from the realm.  The mecho &0crystal will steal part of his divine spark and give you the energy you need,' wait 3s say This will not be easy. wait 1s if !%actor.has_completed[doom_entrance]% mecho %self.name% says, 'You must consult with the three Oracles at the ancient mecho &0pyramid where Severan went to reclaim his stolen bride.  They will give you mecho &0further instructions on gaining access to Lokari's keep.' else mecho %self.name% says, 'Find the Horn of the Hunt and the lost relics of Rhalean mecho &0and Timun, access Lokari's keep, fight past the horrors that await, and take mecho &0Lokari's power!' endif wait 3s say May Death be ever at your back. bow %actor.name% endif

triggers.name: shift_corpse_lokari_receive
triggers.commands: if %object.vnum% == 6228 && %actor.quest_stage[shift_corpse]% == 1 return 0 quest advance shift_corpse %actor.name% mecho %get.obj_shortdesc[6228]% flares with &b&9darkness visible!&0 wait 1s mecho &b&9%self.name%&0 &1ROARS&0 &b&9with divine fury!&0 say You will never destroy me!! kill %actor.name% endif

triggers.name: pyromancer_quest_spell_hints_and_supernova_start
triggers.argument_list: supernova supernova? super super? nova nova? meteorswarm meteorswarm? meteor meteor? swarm swarm?
triggers.commands: wait 2 switch %speech% case super case super? case nova case nova? case supernova case supernova? if %self.class% /= pyromancer if %actor.class% /= Pyromancer if %actor.level% > 88 if %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% == 0 quest start supernova %actor.name% mecho %self.name% says, 'Supernova is really only taught by one person: mecho &0Phayla, daughter of the Sun.' wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Phayla is one of the most powerful sorceresses in mecho &0existence.  Beings from all across the universe have sought her out for just a mecho &0chance to study under her.  Most fail to find her.  She has agreed to teach mecho &0even fewer.' wait 5s mecho %self.name% says, 'She resides in a demiplane of her own creation. mecho &0It's constantly shifting and changing, so it's impossible for anyone but Phayla mecho &0to know where it is or how to access it without help.' wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'However, she likes to leave clues to accessing it mecho &0scattered throughout the world.' wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'On their own, the clues are illegible and mecho &0unintelligible.  The keys to reading them are lamps Phayla gives to her most mecho &0ardent and formidable followers.' wait 4s say If you find one I may be able to help you more. wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'You can check in with me about your &7&b[progress]&0 mecho &0toward learning Supernova at any time.' mecho mecho %self.name% says, 'If you want to know about your armor quests, ask mecho &0me about your &7&0[status]&0 instead.' endif else mecho %self.name% says, 'You're not ready to be asking about such an mecho &0awesome spell.  We can do a follow-up visit after you gain some more mecho &0experience.' endif else say Supernova is beyond your discipline. endif else say Supernova is far outside our discipline. endif break case meteor case meteor? case swarm case swarm? case meteorswarm case meteorswarm? if (%self.class% /= sorcerer || %self.class% /= pyromancer) mecho %self.name% says, 'Crazy old McCabe the Elementalist has developed mecho &0such a spell. If you can find him, you might be able to persuade him to teach mecho &0you &1&bMeteorswarm&0.' mecho mecho &0He likes the devastating effects of volcanoes.' elseif %self.class% /= diabolist mecho %self.name% says, 'We too call flaming rocks from the sky, but through mecho &0different powers.' else mecho %self.name% says, 'I'm afraid I can't help you with that particular mecho &0spell.' endif break default return 0 done

triggers.name: supernova_sunchild_death
triggers.commands: set i %actor.group_size% if %i% set a 1 while %i% >= %a% set person %actor.group_member[%a%]% if %person.room% == %self.room% if %person.quest_stage[supernova]% == 1 quest advance supernova %person.name% endif elseif %person% eval i %i% + 1 endif eval a %a% + 1 done elseif %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% == 1 quest advance supernova %actor.name% endif

triggers.name: supernova_guildmaster_speech2
triggers.argument_list: phalya lamp help? lamp? phayla? help information information? clue clue?
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% == 2 && (%actor.inventory[48917]% || %actor.wearing[48917]%) quest advance supernova %actor.name% set rnd1 %random.3% switch %rnd1% case 1 set step3 4318 break case 2 set step3 10316 break case 3 set step3 58062 break default return 0 done quest variable supernova %actor.name% step3 %step3% set rnd2 %random.3% switch %rnd2% case 1 set step4 18577 break case 2 set step4 17277 break case 3 set step4 8561 break default return 0 done quest variable supernova %actor.name% step4 %step4% set rnd3 %random.3% switch %rnd3% case 1 set step5 53219 break case 2 set step5 47343 break case 3 set step5 16278 break default return 0 done quest variable supernova %actor.name% step5 %step5% set rnd4 %random.3% switch %rnd4% case 1 set step6 58657 break case 2 set step6 35119 break case 3 set step6 55422 break default return 0 done quest variable supernova %actor.name% step6 %step6% set step7 %random.3% quest variable supernova %actor.name% step7 %step7% say Ah I see you found one of Phayla's lamps! wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'Phayla likes to visit the material plane to engage mecho &0in her favorite leisure activities.' wait 2s set clue %actor.quest_variable[supernova:step3]% switch %clue% case 4318 mecho %self.name% says, 'Recently, she was spotted in Anduin, taking in a mecho &0show from the best seat in the house.' break case 10316 mecho %self.name% says, 'I understand she frequents the hottest spring at mecho &0the popular resort up north.' break case 58062 mecho %self.name% says, 'She occasionally visits a small remote island mecho &0theatre, where she enjoys meditating in their reflecting room.' break default return 0 done wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'You may be able to find a clue to her whereabouts mecho &0there.' elseif %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% == 1 mecho %self.name% says, 'If you return here with one of Phayla's lamps, I mecho &0may be able to give you some more insight as to her whereabouts.' endif

triggers.name: supernova_clue_rooms
triggers.commands: set person %self.people% set stage %person.quest_stage[supernova]% while %person% if (%stage% < 6) && (%person.room% == %person.quest_variable[supernova:step%stage%]%) && (%person.inventory[48917]% || %person.wearing[48917]%) if %stage% == 3 wload obj 6229 elseif %stage% == 4 wload obj 6232 elseif %stage% == 5 wload obj 6233 endif wecho &5%get.obj_shortdesc[48917]% begins emitting an eerie purple light!&0 wechoaround %actor% %actor.name% has found a clue to Phayla's whereabouts! wsend %actor% You have found a clue to Phayla's whereabouts! quest advance supernova %person.name% elseif (%stage% == 6) && (%person.room% == %person.quest_variable[supernova:step6]%) && (%person.inventory[48917]% || %person.wearing[48917]%) wload obj 6230 wecho &5Eerie purple light from %get.obj_shortdesc[48917]% reveals a gateway to another dimension!&0 quest advance supernova %person.name% endif set person %person.next_in_room% done

triggers.name: supernova clue 1
triggers.commands: return 0 set stage %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% * * Is the person on the quest? * if %stage% > 0 * * Do they have the lamp? * if (%actor.inventory[48917]% || %actor.wearing[48917]%) if %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% >= 4 switch %actor.quest_variable[supernova:step4]% case 18577 set clue2 I continue my journey where the sun rises amidst a sea of swirling worlds. * The Abbey, the rising sun room break case 17277 set clue2 Atop a tower I visit a master who waits to give his final examination. * Citadel of Testing break case 8561 set clue2 I study in a secret place above a hall of misery beyond a gallery of horrors. * Cathedral of Betrayal near Norisent done osend %actor% Learning is a life-long process. osend %actor% %clue2% else set read no endif * ends the stage check else set read no endif * ends the lamp check else set read no endif * ends the quest check if %read% == no osend %actor% The writings are just a bunch of indecipherable squiggles and lines. endif

triggers.name: supernova_phayla_greet
triggers.commands: wait 1s if %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% == 7 mecho %self.name% says, 'Ah, so you found me %actor.name%.  I was wondering if you would mecho &0make it.' wait 2s emote settles back in a chair. wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'So, why are you here?  Normal people don't just barge into mecho &0someone's home without good reason.  Come on, out with it!' else eye %actor.name% wait 2s blink wait 1s say And who might you be?  You're not at all who I was expecting... endif

triggers.name: supernova_phayla_speech1
triggers.argument_list: supernova supernova? super super? nova nova? teach teach?
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% == 7 roll say Of course that's what you want. wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'No one ever comes just to ask, "How are you?  How's your day mecho &0going?"  Oh no, they always want something.  No sense of class or decorum.' sigh wait 2s say Alright, I'll teach you. wait 1s say But payment upfront.  Give me that miniature sun you found. wait 2s msend %actor% %self.name% shoots you with a harsh, critical look. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% shoots %actor.name% a harsh, critical look. wait 1s say Hand over the lamp too.  Don't think you deserve to have that... endif

triggers.name: supernova_phayla_speech2
triggers.commands: if %speech% /= how are you? || %speech% /= How's your day going? wait 2 say Wonderful, thank you for asking! mload obj 23887 give cookie %actor.name% endif

triggers.name: supernova_phayla_receive
triggers.commands: if %object.vnum% == 51073 || %object.vnum% == 48917 if %actor.quest_variable[supernova:%object.vnum%]% == 1 return 0 mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. say You've already given me this. else quest variable supernova %actor.name% %object.vnum% 1 wait 2 nod mjunk %object% if %actor.quest_variable[supernova:51073]% && %actor.quest_variable[supernova:48917]% say Alright, get comfortable.  This may take a while. wait 3s mecho %self.name% demonstrates some of the basics. msend %actor% You take notes and try to follow along. wait 5s say No, the diagrams need to look like this... mechoaround %actor% %self.name% makes changes to %actor.name%'s notes. msend %actor% %self.name% makes changes to your notes. wait 5s say Yes, that's good.  Move your hands like this. mecho %self.name% waves her hands about. wait 5s say Yes, that's much closer. msend %actor% You feel you're starting to get the hang of it! mechoaround %actor% It seems %actor.name% is starting to get the hang of it! wait 9s msend %actor% You have a breakthrough! mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% has a breakthrough! wait 1s say That's it!!  You've got it! mechoaround %actor% %actor.name% radiates with inner arcane fire! msend %actor% &1&bYou have mastered Supernova!&0 mskillset %actor.name% supernova quest complete supernova %actor.name% else say And the other? endif endif else return 0 say This isn't acceptable payment. mecho %self.name% refuses %object.shortdesc%. endif

triggers.name: supernova_gateway_enter_command
triggers.commands: switch %cmd% case e return 0 halt done switch %arg% case r case ri case rin case ring case g case ga case gat case gate case gatew case gatewa case gateway if %actor.inventory[51073]% || %actor.wearing[51073]% osend %actor% The gateway draws power from %get.obj_shortdesc[51073]% and activates! return 0 wait 2s oecho The gateway folds in on itself and collapses! opurge %self% else return 1 osend %actor% The gateway is inactive. endif break default return 0 done

triggers.name: supernova_status_checker
triggers.commands: set stage %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% wait 2 if %stage% == 1 say You are trying to find one of Phayla's lamps. elseif %stage% == 2 say Have you found one of Phayla's lamps? elseif %stage% == 3 mecho %self.name% says, 'Phayla likes to visit the material plane to engage mecho &0in her favorite leisure activities.' wait 2s set clue %actor.quest_variable[supernova:step3]% switch %clue% case 4318 mecho %self.name% says, 'Recently, she was spotted in Anduin, taking in a mecho &0show from the best seat in the house.' break case 10316 mecho %self.name% says, 'I understand she frequents the hottest spring at mecho &0the popular resort up north.' break case 58062 mecho %self.name% says, 'She occasionally visits a small remote island mecho &0theatre, where she enjoys meditating in their reflecting room.' break default return 0 done wait 2s say You may be able to find a clue to her whereabouts there. elseif %stage% >= 4 mecho %self.name% says, 'Consult the clues Phayla left behind! mecho &0Be sure to &7&blook&0 at them by the light of your lamp!' endif

triggers.name: Shift_corpse_crystal_replacement
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[shift_corpse]% say I can assist. wait 1s emote opens a pitch black box. wait 4 emote takes a glowing black crystal from the box. wait 1s say Take this. mload obj 6228 give glowing-black-crystal %actor% wait 1s say Be more careful this time. endif

triggers.name: supernova clue 2
triggers.commands: return 0 set stage %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% * * Is the person on the quest? * if %stage% > 0 * * Do they have the lamp? * if (%actor.inventory[48917]% || %actor.wearing[48917]%) if %actor.quest_stage[supernova]% >= 5 switch %actor.quest_variable[supernova:step5]% case 53219 set clue3 Where DID the lizard men get that throne from?  I'll see if I can find out. * Lizard King's throne room, Sunken break case 47343 set clue3 They often wonder what would happen if bones could talk.  I'll ask one who can make that happen! * Kryzanthor, Graveyard break case 16278 set clue3 Waves of sand hold the remains of a child of the Sun God.  Supposedly. triggers.name: Gem Exchange greet
triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.vnum% == -1 set item %actor.quest_variable[gem_exchange:gem_vnum]% if %actor.quest_stage[gem_exchange]% == 1 say Welcome back! bow %actor% wait 2s if %item% == 0 msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Tell me, what gemstone are you interested in trading for msend %actor% &0today?' else msend %actor% %self.name% says, 'Are you still looking for %get.obj_shortdesc[%item%]%?' endif else say Greetings! All you have to do mecho &0is tell us what kind of gem you're looking for.' wait 4s say So what can I help you find today? endif endif

rooms.name: Main Street
rooms.description: This winding street, wide and paved with tightly-fitting stones, spirals upward and downward along the side of a reddish-brown mountain. The people walking here look to be of high class, with guards standing attention nearby. The street empties into the middle level of Anduin to the south.

rooms.name: Main Street
rooms.description: This spiraling street heads in upward toward the upper level of Anduin, and downward toward the main gate of Anduin and the middle level. The street is well-paved with flagstones, and shrubbery decorates its edges.

rooms.name: Main Street
rooms.description: This spiraling street winds up the side of a mountain toward a generally flat part that is home to the upper level of Anduin. Another flat part lies below, where more humble buildings stand. The road is well-paved with large flagstones, and shrubs and decorative plants stand along its edges.

rooms.name: Main Street
rooms.description: This wide street empties before a plaza to the west, up here on the uppermost level of Anduin. The mountain housing Anduin has a fairly flat western face, and this is where the two main levels of the city lie. The street is well-paved with tight-fitting flagstones, with shrubs decorating its edges.

rooms.name: Festival Street
rooms.description: This wide street is paved with brightly colored flagstones of almost every imaginable color. It is scrupulously clean and in excellent repair, as are the tall, stately stone buildings standing at its sides. Various ornamental plants line the street and hang from windows, and the presence of guards is very obvious. The street extends to the west a ways, but to the north there stands an elegant clothing shop, and to the south, a high-domed temple of white stone.

rooms.name: Festival Street
rooms.description: This wide street is gaily paved in flagstones of all sorts of colors. It runs from east to west through a beautiful part of Anduin. Stately temples and shops stand to the north and south, all of them in perfect condition and made out of all sorts of different colored stone -- black, red, white, pink, or even yellow. A bank stands to the north, and a stableshop to the south.

rooms.name: Festival Plaza
rooms.description: This wide street, so colorfully paved, has a wide plaza in front of the entrance of the festival grounds that lie westward. The street bends on toward the north, as evidenced by the bright flagstones and cheery shops. Another street, altogether more sober, runs off to the south.

West.description: The gates stand here, leading into the festival grounds.

rooms.name: Festival Street
rooms.description: This wide street is paved with all sorts of colors of large flagstones, all fitting perfectly. The clean street runs from north to south, past large, elegant homes and shops. The traffic through here is moderate, and consists entirely of well-dressed people, both citizens and wide-eyed tourists. A plaza lies southward.

rooms.name: The Entrance to the Festival Grounds
rooms.description: This large stadium is built right into the edge of the mountain's plateau, and affords a gorgeous view of the surrounding mountains and forests. The pale marble of the circular walls is dotted with huge rectangular vents that let in the strong breezes of crisp mountain air. Curving bench seats arranged in staggered rows face the middle of the circular "stage" down below, as well as facing the sky side of the mountain. The stadium gates lie eastward.

East.description: The large stadium gates lead out to the plaza.

Down.description: The aisle through the stadium benches runs down a steep staircase right up to the gated entrance to the Tournament Ring below.

rooms.name: Festival Street
rooms.description: This is a wide street, paved with all sorts of differently colored flagstones. The street runs past large, elegant buildings, most of them expensive looking and in perfect condition. The domed amphitheatre stands to the southwest a ways, and various towers can be seen to the south. An extremely expensive tavern stands to the east.

rooms.name: Festival Street
rooms.description: This is the northern end of Festival Street, a long, gaily-paved road that extends into the heart of the upper level of Anduin. All sorts of expensive-looking buildings stand on either side of the street, and potted plants and ornamental trees line the roadside. The occasional banner can be seen fluttering from somebody's window, giving the whole street an air of gaiety.

rooms.name: Sage Street
rooms.description: This narrow street is paved with dark grey flagstones. The street, as well as the buildings lining it, is in perfect condition. Sober- looking and tall buildings, all made of dark grey stone, rise up around the street, each one well-decorated and scrupulously clean. The vague scent of chemicals permeates the air, particularly from the area of the large white tower to the south.

rooms.name: Sage Street
rooms.description: This narrow street, paved with dark grey flagstones, runs past a rather sober part of the city. The moderate foot traffic seems composed almost entirely of either sorcerous types or guards, and it is pretty quiet here. Tall buildings, like the impressive white tower to the west, stand along the street, all of them in perfect repair. A dark stone shop stands to the east, and many odd smells come from it.

rooms.name: A Bend in Sage Street
rooms.description: This narrow street twists through elaborate, dark-stone houses and shops. The atmosphere here is one of subdued power and elegance, and the foot traffic passing by is all uniformly well-dressed sorcerous types. Guards wander by, making sure it is quiet. A white stone tower stands to the northwest.

rooms.name: Sage Street
rooms.description: The narrow street, paved with dark flagstones, runs east-west through elaborate, gothic dark-stone houses and buildings. The foot traffic here all appears to be scholars or wizards, with guards happening by frequently. The buildings and street are all in excellent condition, and very clean.

rooms.name: Sage Street
rooms.description: This is the end of Sage Street, a dark-paved road leading past sober, dark-stone buildings. The street and buildings are in excellent condition, and the people on this part of the road are almost all scholars and wizards, with guards carefully standing watch here and there.

rooms.name: A Domed Temple
rooms.description: This large temple is spacious and airy, with a very high domed ceiling that is painted with all sorts of murals. The white alabaster flagstone floor leads to an archway to the east, and a similarly white staircase leads upward. Potted plants stand along the walls, and the scent of green things comes down from above.

rooms.name: The Priests' Altar
rooms.description: This large alabaster chamber has a dark blue runner carpet along its center, leading toward the altar on the eastern end of the circular room. The ceiling is high, and there are no furnishings other than the altar and some kneeling benches. The light comes in, magnifies off of the white walls, and lights up the whole chamber with intensely bright white illumination. An archway leads off to the west.

rooms.name: A White Tower
rooms.description: This tall tower overlooks the mountainrange outside, and has many small windows set into its white stone walls that reveal the lovely view. A staircase winds down below, and archways stand to the north and south. This entryway is fairly spartan, but owing to the high ceiling, it has a spacious, airy feel. An archway leads out to the street to the east.

rooms.name: The Pyromancers' Study
rooms.description: A huge fire roars in the northern wall of this large study, lighting the white stones of the tower walls red and orange. The room is terribly hot, and the noise of the burning wood is constant. All sorts of tapestries depicting flame and its uses adorn the walls. The circular rug on the floor is red and thick. An archway leads southward.

rooms.name: The Cryomancers' Study
rooms.description: This large semicircular chamber is quite cold, without any heat sources. The thick circular rug on the floor is night-blue, and the tapestries on the walls all seem to depict fairly static scenes of the frozen tundra. Desks and bookshelves line the walls, giving aspiring ice mages a place to study their arcane art. An archway leads northward.

rooms.name: A Lush Rooftop Garden
rooms.description: This beautiful garden probably has the best view in the whole city. The low terrace reveals a magnificent vista of mountains and lush green forests, far away but painfully detailed and bright in the crisp air. Plants grow all around in what must be a very thin layer of dirt, and in all ways, this place resembles a normal sylvan grove. Nearby can be seen the white dome of the temple, past a small walkway to the staircase.

rooms.name: The Black Room
rooms.description: This utterly circular room is painted flat black, and has a black carpet on the floor. It has no tapestries on the walls at all, and no decorations. The bookshelves visible are empty. There are no light sources in here, and no windows. A stone staircase, also painted black, leads upstairs.

rooms.name: Serena's Garb
rooms.description: This intimate little shop has a thick blue carpet on the floor and white-painted walls covered in exotic tapestries. The patrons in the shop are well-dressed, some of them obviously magical sorts, all browsing the shelves of fine clothing. The only exit lies southward. A sign is posted near the door.

extras.text: The sign reads: Our many friends in the magical and wisdom-seeking fields will especially appreciate our fine clothing.

rooms.name: Shazz's Shop of Many Wonders
rooms.description: This large shop is crammed with various philtres, potions, salves, scrolls, wands, and other magical items, most of which are not labeled or marked in any way save for price. Small oriel windows let in the light, and lanterns dangle from the ceiling by chains. Patrons wander in and out, most of them very exotic-looking.

rooms.name: The Golden Goblet Inn and Tavern
rooms.description: This very expensive tavern has a hardwood floor that shines with recent polishing, and well-made furniture. White linen tablecloths top the tables, and the chairs are padded with red velvet cushions. The staff here are well-dressed and attractive, serving a variety of delicious foods and drink to the numerous patrons. A reception for the inn lies to the east, and a door leads outside to the west.

rooms.name: The Golden Goblet Reception Area
rooms.description: Down a hallway and away from the muted noise of the tavern to the west, this reception area fronts a long hallway of doors. The decor is quietly expensive, with a red runner on the hardwood floor and pictures on the walls. A few people pass by, but it's very quiet here. A hallway leads to the tavern.

rooms.name: Shula's Stablehouse
rooms.description: This is Shula's Stablehouse.  She has a few stacks of food for the shop animals around and on some shelves.  There is an oak counter on the north wall of the room, which is otherwise divided in half.  The south half is where all the animals for sale stand sullenly.

rooms.name: Shula's Backroom
rooms.description: Shula's backroom, you should not be here, tell a god.

rooms.name: A Bank
rooms.description: This is a small bank, but very opulent. Sandstone walls, polished to a sheen, define the building, and it has a deep red carpet on the floor, making walking a pleasure. A large counter stands to the north, with a sign on it. The only exit lies to the south.

rooms.name: The Top of the Tower
rooms.description: The top of the tower is also made of white stone, and affords a beautiful view, via domed skylight, of the surrounding mountains and sky. The tiled floor is adorned with rugs, and light pours in day and night through the skylight up above.

rooms.name: Tournament Ring
rooms.description: A scuffed and bloody floor of wooden boards lies here in the center of the arena.  A single wooden-gated entrance breaks the low wooden railing that divides the arena from the stadium seats that rise all around.  Fluttering flags of festive colors rise at regular intervals, away from the stadium aisles.

Up.description: An aisle of stairs leads up through the bench seats toward the Festival Grounds' exit gates.  A smaller wooden gate stands at the entrance to the Tournament Ring.

rooms.name: Disused Bath House
rooms.description: Cobwebs fill the corners of this darkened, musty, moist room.  Slate-paved walls are cracking where cement falls from between the stones.  A winding path leads between the exit on the north and a dark doorway to the south.  The path avoids two large, circular bathing pools, which are unfortunately filled with rank water whose moisture makes the floor slippery.  A most unpleasant place.

rooms.name: Resplendent Cove
rooms.description: Amazingly, this room appears to be carved from solid marble with veins of gold and silver freely criscrossing the polished surface.  It is shaped like a fat torus, with a sloping column in the center, still constructed of the same, unbroken marble.  Low seats and piles of red vellum cushions are scattered about.  It is all brightly lit by several steady lanterns hung high up near the ceiling.  An exit leads north.

rooms.name: Phayla's Greeting Room
rooms.description: Brilliant light fills this exquisitely appointed greeting room from all directions.  Vaulting marble arches suspend a towering ceiling of multifaceted glass mosaics.  The walls are composed of stained glass which refract the light into glorious sprays of color and splendor.  The scintillating light is omni-directional without any obvious obstructions or occlusions.  Combined with the heat of the room, it appears Phayla has built her realm in the heart of a burning star!

rooms.name: Phayla's Sanctuary
rooms.description: The all-encompassing glass of Phayla's home forms a vast round chamber supported by three arches which intersect at the apex of the room giving the sanctuary a hexagonal feel.  Stained glass mosaics cover the walls and ceiling filling the sanctuary with glowing embers of light and heat.  The floor of the sanctuary is white marble inlaid with the image of a radiating golden sun. Various accoutrements for highly advanced magical experimentation adorn the sanctuary.

rooms.name: The High Tower Ballroom
rooms.description: Looming over Sage Street is the High Tower Ballroom, one of the most prominent spires in the city of Anduin.  It is a gathering place for knights and nobles, kings and queens, dragon slayers and politicians, alike.  They host the most lavish balls and sorties on the continent, a who's who of the grand personages of Caelia.

rooms.name: The Gem Exchange
rooms.description: The Anduin branch of the Soltan Gem Exchange network is a massive trading house where gem merchants from all across Ethilien come to swap and build inventory.  Adventurers in need of specific gems can come here to find anything they might need.
